title: Modality Principle-Based Arabic Learning Simulation Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational understanding of Arabic script and pronunciation, intermediate language learning experience
context.additional_context: Personalized language learning utilizing VR simulations and multimedia tools in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can accurately produce pronunciations of 200 Arabic words in a VR environment combining audio and image modalities
Learners achieve over 15% higher word recall rates in audio-based simulations compared to text-based methods
Learners achieve over 80% accuracy in Arabic sentence structure analysis through modality principle-based simulations
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
